alert.note: Alert for Brown; Martin; Redwood; Watonwan; Yellow Medicine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 30 at 3:29AM CDT until May 30 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM CDT FOR REDWOOD...NORTHERN MARTIN...SOUTHEASTERN YELLOW MEDICINE... WESTERN BROWN AND WATONWAN COUNTIES... At 329 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Echo to near Jackson In Jackson County, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Redwood Falls, St. James, Sleepy Eye, Springfield, Sherburn, Truman, Morgan, Lamberton, Trimont, Wabasso, Welcome and Butterfield. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Martin; Redwood; Watonwan; Yellow Medicine
